UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution
UI.a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
UI.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
UI.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

confirmCheck.body: Are you sure you wish to finish ?

confirmRetry.body: Are you sure you wish to retry ?

question: As shown, your sled has gotten away from you and is sliding down the hill without you.  It is slowing down.  Which of the following is the most correct free body diagram for the sled during this process?  More than one may be correct, but only select one answer.  Some answers that use notation you might be familiar with from a previous physics course may be correct;  don't assume that anything not using
notation is wrong.  However, you can assume that at least one option using
notation is correct.  For forces using

notation, assume the following meanings of letters in subscripts for agents and targets:s = sled
g = ground
E = Earth
v = velocity
a = applied force
